publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1239# Frances Curran: World Lupus Day-That the Parliament congratulates LUPUS UK, the national charity for lupus sufferers, on its involvement in World Lupus Day which takes place on 10 May 2004; notes that its participation in this event aims to publicise the illness lupus, an auto immune disease which is currently incurable and, although less well-known, appears to be more common worldwide than leukaemia, multiple sclerosis and muscular dystrophy; further notes that lupus can be life-threatening and adversely affects the lives of sufferers, and hopes that World Lupus Day is successful in raising awareness of this illness.

S2M-1239# World Lupus Day (lodged on 30 April 2004) Christine Grahame*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Scanlon*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Colin Fox*, Carolyn Leckie*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*, Shiona Baird*, Chris Ballance*, Margaret Jamieson*, Murray Tosh*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-1239# World Lupus Day (lodged on 30 April 2004) John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1239# World Lupus Day (lodged on 30 April 2004) Marlyn Glen*
S2M-1239# World Lupus Day (lodged on 30 April 2004) Rosie Kane*
S2M-1239# World Lupus Day (lodged on 30 April 2004) Trish Godman*
S2M-1239# World Lupus Day (lodged on 30 April 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
